recipesJson.name: Derailed (Suicide Bunny Remix)
recipesJson.author: Juicefairy
recipesJson.description: This is the closest thing to the OG derailed from Suicide Bunny.  If you are sensitive to the Peppery notes from TFA custard you can mix it with Cap Custard but I would lower the % to somewhere between 3% and 4%. This recipe benefits from added PG I'm not exactly sure why because I'm not a chemist but there is a difference when I made it max VG. Steep time is minimum 2 weeks. but best after 4 weeks.

reviews.text:
I’ve made this a few times now. First time was to the recipe and it is delicious. Second time I had to sub banana cream for LA banana cream and also sub tpa custard for CAP custard, still delicious. 
Used to be a big fan of Suicide bunny’s line but haven’t had it in years. Don’t remember derailed being this good. Bravo.
Will mix it today looks good
